content.rendered:
Directed by Kenji Ono. Ian Abando. Kai Akira. Vince Aparo. Everett Downing Jr.. Patrick Harpin. Cole Harrington.

Written by Everett Downing Jr.. Everett Downing Jr.. Juston Gordon-Montgomery. Juston Gordon-Montgomery. Patrick Harpin. Patrick Harpin. Shakira Pressley. Eric Rivera. Adele Williams.

Cast Priah Ferguson (Lisa 1). Jecobi Swain (Sean 1). Kari Wahlgren (Lootbat). Yvette Nicole Brown (KRS). Jamie Chung (Vax). Everett Downing Jr. (Bogdog). Patrick Harpin (Kryll). Jim Rash (The Fixer). Rob Riggle (Glorlox). Maddie Taylor (Torga). Yvonne Orji (Tess). Kevin Durand (Chakalau). Keith Ferguson (EHC Guard 3). Leslie Uggams (Grandma). Greg Chun (Additional Voices). Katie Shaughnessy (Additional Voices). Christian Lanz (Additional Voices). Dino Andrade (Busted Bot). Andrew Morgado (Additional Voices). SungWon Cho (EHC Guard 3). Devin Bright (Player 2). Angela Malhotra (Alien In Commercial). Jenna Elfman (Setelva). Max Mittelman (Angry Boarfish). KenshÃ´ Ono (Pulgan Child 1). Lauren Tom (Chillion Supervisor). Donna Allen (Additional Voices). Secunda Wood (Pulgan Walla)

Language English.

Producers Everett Downing Jr.. Patrick Harpin.

Production Cartoon Pizza. Chicken And Egg Pictures. Cinesite.

Creators Everett Downing Jr.. Patrick Harpin.

No. of Seasons 1

No. of Episodes 10

Status On Going (2023–)
